nodes.text: The Heaven system was located in the Oplovis sector. According to Mostema, the population of this system was almost completely human with a population of 174.2 billion. Ruled by a company, the system had its own language that was remarked to be very difficult to learn.

Around 182 BBY, a suspect disappearance of a group of Gotal occurred without a proper explanation from the ruling corporation. This caused many Gotal to be wary of the Heaven sector to the extent that it was extremely rare for one to find a Gotal in the system.
The Heaven system appears in the 2020 novel The Vow of Silver Dawn. The Chinese novel identifies the star system as "乾星系," which, in the context of Chinese philosophy, means "Heaven system."
